entry.title: Salad market shop in Vorzel Park
entry.content:
Shop "Salad Market" is located near the second house and offers a wide range of goods.

The store is open from 8.00 to 22.00

entry.title: Residential complex Vorzel Park in Vorzel village
entry.content:
The residential complex embodies a cozy family corner, where you can relax from the hustle and bustle of the big city, breathe fresh air and enjoy the silence of life in the suburbs.

Due to the developed infrastructure of the village. Vorzel does not need to go to the capital every day. Since the village has a developed infrastructure, namely the branch of "Nova Poshta", sports complexes, cafes and supermarkets, bike paths, parks and many playgrounds.

The yard of the residential complex Vorzel Park is fenced and parking for 300 parking spaces is provided. The territory is asphalted and has its own playgrounds. On the territory of the complex there is a shop and a cafe where you can spend time with family and friends. And the barbecue area will allow you to feel the aroma of nature and cook your favorite dish without leaving the yard.

Contacts
